SA15n1245:9: dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ matā sā cet saṃvṛtyā astu yathā tathā ||4 ||
SA15n1245:45: nityatvādapi kiṃ tasya kastāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ ||22 ||
SA15n1245:47: nīlādyākāraleśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ ||23 ||
SA15n1245:61: yanniṣṭhāsta ime śabdā na rūpaṃ tasya kiñcana ||30 ||
SA15n1245:83: tathā dvirūpatāyāṃ vā tad vastvekaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ||41 ||
SA15n1245:84: tābhyāṃ tadanyadeva syād yadi rūpaṃ samaṃ tayoḥ |
SA15n1245:85: tayoriti na sambandho vyāvṛttistu na duṣyati ||42 ||
SA15n1245:87: kārya cet tadanekaṃ syānnaścaraṃ ca na tanmatam ||43 ||
SA15n1245:97: yadi nāmendriyāṇāṃ syād draṣṭā bhāseta tadvapuḥ ||48 ||
SA15n1245:111: gatiścet pararūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā ||55 ||
SA15n1245:123: tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣo'rtho viśeṣeṇa na gamyate ||61 ||
SA15n1245:124: yā ca sambandhino dharmād bhūtirdharmiṇi jñāyate |
SA15n1245:141: tadvaśya tato jātaṃ tatsvabhāvo'pi vā bhavet ||70 ||
SA15n1245:142: svanimittāt svabhāvād vā vinā nārthasya sambhavaḥ |
SA15n1245:145: anyeṣu satsvadṛśye ca satta vā tadvataḥ katham ||72 ||
SA15n1245:162: yo hi bhāvo yathābhūto sa tadṛgliṅ gacetasaḥ |
SA15n1245:169: nimittaṃ tatsvabhāvo vā kāraṇam tacca taddhiyaḥ ||84 ||
SA15n1245:176: siddhaḥ kenāsahasthānāditi cet tat kuto matam |
SA15n1245:181: prayogaḥ kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ sarvatrārtho na bhidyate ||90 ||
SA15n1245:190: bhinno'bhinno'pi vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujjate |
SA15n1245:192: yathā vastveva vastūnāṃ sādhane sādhanaṃ matam |
SA15n1245:201: tacca hetau svabhāve vā dṛśye dṛśyatā mate ||100 ||
SA15n1245:204: nānyāsyānityatā bhāvāt pūrva siddhaḥ sa cenidriyāt |
SA15n1245:225: ṣaṣṭhayādyayogāditi cedū antayoḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet ||112 ||
SA15n1245:231: sā sattā sa ca sambandho nityau kāryamatheha kim ||115 ||
SA15n1245:252: ekatra dṛṣṭau bhedo hi kvacinnānyatra dṛśyate |
SA15n1245:257: viṣayo yaśca śabdānāṃ saṃyojyeta sa eva taiḥ ||128 ||
SA15n1245:277: śuddhe manovikalpe ca na kramagrahaṇaṃ bhavet ||138 ||
SA15n1245:281: cakrabhrāntiṃ dṛgādhatte na dṛśāṃ ghaṭanena sā ||140 ||
SA15n1245:300: śṛṅgaṃ gavīti loke syāt śṛṃge gaurityalaukikam |
SA15n1245:305: tantvākhyāṃ vartayet kārye darśayan nāśrayaṃ śruteḥ ||152 ||
SA15n1245:308: anumānaṃ ca jātyādau vastuno nāsti bhedini |
SA15n1245:311: geho yadyapi saṃyogastanmālā kinnu tad bhavet ||155 ||
SA15n1245:326: vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tanniṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ |
SA15n1245:331: śabdāt tadapi nārthātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanodbhavā ||165 ||
SA15n1245:335: ākāraḥ sa ca nārthe'sti taṃ vadannarthabhāk katham ||167 ||
SA15n1245:339: śabdārtho'rthaḥ sa eveti vacane na virudhyate ||169 ||
SA15n1245:346: tasmād jātyāditadyogā nārthe teṣu ca na śrutiḥ |
SA15n1245:361: siddhaṃ tatkena tasmin hi na pratyakṣaṃ na laiṅgikam ||180 ||
SA15n1245:369: sarva tathaiva hetorhi bhedād bhedaḥ falātmanām ||184 ||
SA15n1245:373: anapekṣya na cecchaktaṃ syāt smṛtāveva liṃgavat ||186 ||
SA15n1245:383: atha kasmād dvayādhīnajanma tat tena nocyate ||191 ||
SA15n1245:388: sañcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sa sāmānyaṃ tatra cākṣadhīḥ |
SA15n1245:400: nai kaṃ citrapataṃgādi rūpaṃ vā dṛśyate katham |
SA15n1245:402: naikasvabhāvaṃ citraṃ hi maṇirūpaṃ yathaiva tat |
SA15n1245:420: kiṃ syāt sā citrataikasyām na syāt tasyāṃ matāvapi |
SA15n1245:421: yadīdaṃ svayamarthānāṃ rocate tatra ke vayam ||210 ||
SA15n1245:427: tasmāt tadeva tasyāpi tattvaṃ yā dvayaśūnyatā ||213 ||
SA15n1245:433: lakṣaṇaṃ sa ca tattvaṃ na tenāpyete vilakṣaṇāḥ ||216 ||
SA15n1245:442: yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathaiva prakāśate |
SA15n1245:446: ko vā virodho bahavaḥ sañjātātiśayāḥ pṛthak |
SA15n1245:448: hetubhāvād ṛte nānyā grāhyatā nāma kācana |
SA15n1245:450: kathaṃ vā'vayavī grāhyā sakṛt svāvayavaiḥ saha |
SA15n1245:494: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti ced grāhyātāṃ viduḥ |
SA15n1245:500: avedakāḥ parasyāpi te svarūpaṃ kathaṃ viduḥ |
SA15n1245:505: dṛṣṭaṃ janma sukhādīnāṃ tat tulyaṃ manasāmapi ||252 ||
SA15n1245:506: asatsu satsu caiteṣu na janmājanma vā kvacit |
SA15n1245:507: dṛṣṭaṃ sukhāderbuddhervā tat tato nānyaśca te ||253 ||
SA15n1245:511: multvā taṃ pratipadyeta sukhādīneva sā kathan ||255 ||
SA15n1245:516: pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayornīlādivat sukham |
SA15n1245:518: na hi saṃvedanaṃ yuktam arthenaiva saha grahe |
SA15n1245:519: kiṃ sāmarthya sukhādīnāṃ neṣṭā dhīryat tadudbhavā ||259 ||
SA15n1245:537: grāhyānāha na tasyāpi sakṛd yukto dvayagrahaḥ ||268 ||
SA15n1245:543: sa idānīṃ kathaṃ bāhyāḥ sukhādyātmeti gamyate ||271 ||
SA15n1245:545: agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tato hīyeta bhoktṛtā ||272 ||
SA15n1245:548: tasmāt ta āntarā eva saṃvedyatvācca cetanāḥ |
SA15n1245:549: saṃvedanaṃ na yad rūpaṃ na hi tat tasya vedanam ||274 ||
SA15n1245:562: prāguktaṃ yogināṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhāvanāmayam |
SA15n1245:567: svapne'pi smaryate smārta na ca tat tādṛgarthavat ||283 ||
SA15n1245:572: tatra pramāṇaṃ saṃvādi yat prāṅ nirṇītavastuvat |
SA15n1245:574: śabdārthagrāhi yad yatra tajjñānaṃ tatra kalpanā |
SA15n1245:593: tat tulyaṃ vikriyāvaccet saiveyaṃ kiṃ niṣidhyate ||296 ||
SA15n1245:598: suptasya jāgrato vāpi yaiva dhīḥ sfuṭabhāsinī |
SA15n1245:603: sādhanaṃ na hi tasya sādhanaṃ yā kriyā yataḥ ||301 ||
SA15n1245:614: sā ca tasyātmabhūtaiva tena nārthāntaraṃ falam |
SA15n1245:627: atādrū pye na bhedo'pi tadvadanyadhiyo'pi vā ||313 ||
SA15n1245:629: ekārthatve dvayaṃ vyartha na ca syāt kramabhāvitā ||314 ||
SA15n1245:633: dharmeḥ sa niyamo na syāt sambandhasyāviśeṣataḥ ||316 ||
SA15n1245:641: tadarthavedanaṃ kena tādrū pyād vyabhicāri tat ||320 ||
SA15n1245:643: sarūpayanti tat kena sthūlābhāsaṃ ca te'ṇavaḥ ||321 ||
SA15n1245:648: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedam iti yatrāvasāyadhīḥ |
SA15n1245:652: ātmā sa tasyānubhavaḥ s ca nānyasya kasyacit |
SA15n1245:666: yadi bahyo'nubhūyeta ko doṣo naiva kaścana |
SA15n1245:684: yadi bāhyaṃ na vidyeta ksya saṃvedanaṃ bhavet |
SA15n1245:685: yadyagatyā svarūpasya bāhyasyaiva na kiṃ matam ||342 ||
SA15n1245:692: tasmāt prameye bāhye 'pi yuktaṃ svānubhavaḥ falam |
SA15n1245:699: tasmād buddhiniveśyārthaḥ sādhanaṃ tasya sā kriyā ||349 ||
SA15n1245:700: yathā niviśate so'rtho yataḥ sā prathate tathā |
SA15n1245:713: dūre yathā vā maruṣu mahānalpo'pi dṛśyate ||356 ||
SA15n1245:720: bhāvā yena nirūpyante tadrūpaṃ nāsti tattvataḥ |
SA15n1245:721: yasmādekamanekaṃ ca rūpaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate ||360 ||
SA15n1245:729: tādātmyādātmavit tasya sa tasya sādhanaṃ tataḥ ||364 ||
SA15n1245:733: iti sā yogyatā mānamātmā meyaḥ falaṃ svavit ||366 ||
SA15n1245:735: sā yogyateti ca proktaṃ pramāṇaṃ svātmavedanam ||367 ||
SA15n1245:741: viṣayatvaṃ tadaṃśena tadabhāve na tad bhavet ||370 ||
SA15n1245:745: sā cānityā na jātiḥ syānnityā cā janikā katham ||372 ||
SA15n1245:753: nityamātmani sambandhe pratīyāt kathitaṃ ca na ||376 ||
SA15n1245:765: bhrāntyā saṅkalanaṃ jyotirmanaskāre ca sā bhavet ||382 ||
SA15n1245:766: sarveṣāmapi kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ |
SA15n1245:785: niyamaṃ yadi na bru yāt pratyayāt samanantarāt ||392 ||
SA15n1245:789: buddhīrāśritya kalpyeta yadi kiṃ vā virudhyate ||394 ||
SA15n1245:790: anagnijanyo dhūmaḥ syāt tatkāryāt kāraṇe gatiḥ |
SA15n1245:791: na syāt kāraṇatāyāṃ vā kuta ekāntato gatiḥ ||395 ||
SA15n1245:796: astyeṣa viduṣāṃ vādo bāhyāṃ tvāśritya varṇyate |
SA15n1245:804: tathā hyāśritya pitaraṃ tadrūpo'pi sutaḥ pituḥ |
SA15n1245:814: sa eva yadi dhīhetuḥ ki pradīpamapekṣate |
SA15n1245:819: ālokana na mandena dṛśyate'to bhidā yadi ||409 ||
SA15n1245:824: mandaṃ tadapi tejaḥ kimāvṛteriha sā na kim |
SA15n1245:831: arthānarthau na yena stastadadṛṣṭaṃ karoti kim ||415 ||
SA15n1245:845: āhuḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedaṃ sa doṣo'trāpi pūrvavat ||422 ||
SA15n1245:855: svaṃ ca rūpaṃ na sā vettītyutsanno'nubhavo'khilaḥ ||427 ||
SA15n1245:858: yo yasya viṣayābhāsastaṃ vetti na tadipyapi |
SA15n1245:860: buddhiḥ sarūpā tadviccet nedānīṃ vit sarūpikā ||430 ||
SA15n1245:870: na ca kenacidaṃśena sarva sarvasya vedanam ||435 ||
SA15n1245:886: dṛṣṭākhyā tatra cet siddhaṃ sārūpyesya svavedanam ||443 ||
SA15n1245:887: athātmarūpaṃ no vetti pararūpasya vit katham |
SA15n1245:892: tadārtho jñānamiti ca jñāte ceti gatā kathā ||446 ||
SA15n1245:893: atha svarūpam sā tarhi svayameva prakāśate |
SA15n1245:901: tajjā tatpratibhāsā va yadi dhīrvetti nāparā |
SA15n1245:904: sā dhīrnirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyaṃ ca tadagrahe ||452 ||
SA15n1245:905: na gṛhyat iti proktam na ca tadvastu kiñcana |
SA15n1245:914: nodeti duḥkhamiti cet na vai duḥkhasamudbhavaḥ ||457 ||
SA15n1245:917: bhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ yadā |
SA15n1245:918: na tadālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na tadaivaṃ prayujyate ||459 ||
SA15n1245:922: taccākṣamartho dhīḥ pūrvo manaskāro'pi vā bhavet ||461 ||
SA15n1245:925: tathārtho dhīmanaskārau jñānaṃ tau ca na sidhyataḥ |
SA15n1245:927: liṅgaṃ saiva nanu jñānaṃ vyakto'rtho'nena varṇitaḥ |
SA15n1245:932: sa ca jñāto'tha vā'jñāto bhavejjñātasya liṅgatā ||466 ||
SA15n1245:935: adṛṣṭadṛṣṭayo'nyena draṣṭrā dṛṣṭā na hi kvacit |
SA15n1245:940: tasya bhedaḥ kuto buddhe rvyabhicāryanyajaśca saḥ ||470 ||
SA15n1245:950: ityarthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ nārthāt tasyāḥ kathañcana ||475 ||
SA15n1245:955: prakāśitā kathaṃ vā syāt buddhirbuddh yantareṇa vaḥ |
SA15n1245:961: iti prakāśarūpā naḥ svayaṃ dhīḥ samprakāśate |
SA15n1245:963: sādṛśye'pi hi dhīranyā prakāśyā na tayā matā |
SA15n1245:976: dhiyaḥ svayaṃ ca na sthānaṃ tadūrdhvaviṣayāsthiteḥ ||488 ||
SA15n1245:977: sthāne svayaṃ na naśyet sā paścādapyaviśeṣataḥ |
SA15n1245:982: na dīrghagrāhikā sā ca tanna syād dīrghadhīsmṛtiḥ ||491 ||
SA15n1245:983: pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnāṃ saṃvittau taddhvaniśruteḥ |
SA15n1245:984: avicchinnābhatā na syād ghaṭanaṃ ca nirākṛtam ||492 ||
SA15n1245:992: buddhiśca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramād varṇān prapadyate ||496 ||
SA15n1245:1001: bādhake sati sannyāye vicchinna iti tat kutaḥ |
SA15n1245:1002: buddhīnāṃ śaktiniyamāditi cet sa kuto bhataḥ ||501 ||
SA15n1245:1012: sa evāyamiti jñānaṃ nāsti tacchakṣaje kutaḥ ||506 ||
SA15n1245:1015: na hyarthābhāsi ca jñānamartho bāhyaśca kevalaḥ |
SA15n1245:1017: sūpalakṣeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau |
SA15n1245:1018: arthārthapratyayo paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham ||509 ||
SA15n1245:1022: na hi saṃvedanaṃ śuddhaṃ bhavedarthasya vedanam ||511 ||
SA15n1245:1023: tathā hi nīlādyākāra eka ekaṃ ca vedanam |
SA15n1245:1024: lakṣyate na tu nīlābhe vedane vedanaṃ param ||512 ||
SA15n1245:1026: dṛṣṭā tadvedanaṃ kena tasyāpyanyena ced imām ||513 ||
SA15n1245:1028: pūrvā dhīḥ saiva cenna syāt sañcāro viṣayāntare ||514 ||
SA15n1245:1031: ātmani jñānajanane svabhāve niyatāṃ ca tām |
SA15n1245:1033: bāhyāḥ sannihito'pyarthastāṃ vibadhnan hi na prabhuḥ |
SA15n1245:1041: śaktikṣaye pūrvādhiyo na hi dhīḥ prāgdhiyā vinā |
SA15n1245:1051: ekaiva cet kriyaikaḥ syāt kiṃ dīpo'nekadarśanaḥ |
SA15n1245:1054: niyamaḥ sa kutaḥ paścāt buddheścedastu sammatam ||527 ||
SA15n1245:1056: agrāhyaṃ na hi tejo'sti na ca saukṣamyādyanaṃśake ||528 ||
SA15n1245:1066: rūpādi buddheḥ kiṃ jātaṃ paścād yat prāṅ na vidyate ||533 ||
SA15n1245:1068: cetaso grāhyatā saiva tato nārthāntare gatiḥ ||534 ||
SA15n1245:1073: artha pūrvañca vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyad yadi dhīḥ parā |
